children.value: In our previous article, we introduced how the zeromorph protocol can be integrated with KZG to create a Polynomial Commitment Scheme (PCS) for multilinear polynomials. This article discusses how the zeromorph protocol can be integrated with FRI to form another PCS.
As previously explained, the zeromorph protocol ultimately reduces to proving a key equation:
